1: ר֛וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>The Spirit</n> אֲדֹנָ֥י <sup>136 </sup> <n>of the Lord</n> יְהוִ֖ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> עָלָ֑י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> יַ֡עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>Because</n> מָשַׁח֩ <sup>4886 </sup> <n>hath anointed</n> יְהוָ֨ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[is] upon me because the LORD</n> אֹתִ֜י <sup>853 </sup> לְבַשֵּׂ֣ר <sup>1319 </sup> <n>me to preach good tidings</n> עֲנָוִ֗ים <sup>6035 </sup> <n>unto the meek</n> שְׁלָחַ֙נִי֙ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>he hath sent</n> לַחֲבֹ֣שׁ <sup>2280 </sup> <n>me to bind up</n> לְנִשְׁבְּרֵי־ <sup>7665 </sup> <n>break down</n> לֵ֔ב <sup>3820 </sup> <n>care for</n> לִקְרֹ֤א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>to proclaim</n> לִשְׁבוּיִם֙ <sup>7617 </sup> <n>to the captives</n> דְּר֔וֹר <sup>1865 </sup> <n>liberty</n> וְלַאֲסוּרִ֖ים <sup>631 </sup> <n>to [them that are] bound</n> פְּקַח־ קֽוֹחַ׃ <sup>6495 </sup> <n>and the opening of the prison</n>
2: לִקְרֹ֤א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>To proclaim</n> שְׁנַת־ <sup>8141 </sup> <n>year</n> רָצוֹן֙ <sup>7522 </sup> <n>the acceptable</n> לַֽיהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וְי֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>and the day</n> נָקָ֖ם <sup>5359 </sup> <n>of vengeance</n> לֵאלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of our God</n> לְנַחֵ֖ם <sup>5162 </sup> <n>to comfort</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲבֵלִֽים׃ <sup>57 </sup> <n>all that mourn</n>
3: לָשׂ֣וּם ׀ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>To appoint</n> לַאֲבֵלֵ֣י <sup>57 </sup> <n>unto them that mourn</n> צִיּ֗וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>in Zion</n> לָתֵת֩ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>to give</n> לָהֶ֨ם פְּאֵ֜ר <sup>6287 </sup> <n>unto them beauty</n> תַּ֣חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>instead</n> אֵ֗פֶר <sup>665 </sup> <n>for ashes</n> שֶׁ֤מֶן <sup>8081 </sup> <n>the oil</n> שָׂשׂוֹן֙ <sup>8342 </sup> <n>of joy</n> תַּ֣חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>instead</n> אֵ֔בֶל <sup>60 </sup> <n>for mourning</n> מַעֲטֵ֣ה <sup>4594 </sup> <n>the garment</n> תְהִלָּ֔ה <sup>8416 </sup> <n>of praise</n> תַּ֖חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>instead</n> ר֣וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>for the spirit</n> כֵּהָ֑ה <sup>3544 </sup> <n>of heaviness</n> וְקֹרָ֤א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>that they might be called</n> לָהֶם֙ אֵילֵ֣י <sup>352 </sup> <n>trees</n> הַצֶּ֔דֶק <sup>6664 </sup> <n>of righteousness</n> מַטַּ֥ע <sup>4302 </sup> <n>the planting</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> לְהִתְפָּאֵֽר׃ <sup>6286 </sup> <n>that he might be glorified</n>
4: וּבָנוּ֙ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>And they shall build</n> חָרְב֣וֹת <sup>2723 </sup> <n>wastes</n> עוֹלָ֔ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>the old</n> שֹׁמְמ֥וֹת <sup>8074 </sup> <n>desolations</n> רִֽאשֹׁנִ֖ים <sup>7223 </sup> <n>the former</n> יְקוֹמֵ֑מוּ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>they shall raise up</n> וְחִדְּשׁוּ֙ <sup>2318 </sup> <n>and they shall repair</n> עָ֣רֵי <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> חֹ֔רֶב <sup>2721 </sup> <n>the waste</n> שֹׁמְמ֖וֹת <sup>8074 </sup> <n>the desolations</n> דּ֥וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>of many</n> וָדֽוֹר׃ <sup>1755 </sup> <n>generations</n>
5: וְעָמְד֣וּ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>shall stand</n> זָרִ֔ים <sup>2114 </sup> <n>And strangers</n> וְרָע֖וּ <sup>7462 </sup> <n>and feed</n> צֹאנְכֶ֑ם <sup>6629 </sup> <n>your flocks</n> וּבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and the sons</n> נֵכָ֔ר <sup>5236 </sup> <n>of the alien</n> אִכָּרֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>406 </sup> <n>[shall be] your plowmen</n> וְכֹרְמֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>3755 </sup> <n>and your vinedressers</n>
6: וְאַתֶּ֗ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> כֹּהֲנֵ֤י <sup>3548 </sup> <n>the Priests</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> תִּקָּרֵ֔אוּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>But ye shall be named</n> מְשָׁרְתֵ֣י <sup>8334 </sup> <n>you the Ministers</n> אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of our God</n> יֵאָמֵ֖ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>[men] shall call</n> לָכֶ֑ם חֵ֤יל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>the riches</n> גּוֹיִם֙ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the Gentiles</n> תֹּאכֵ֔לוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>ye shall eat</n> וּבִכְבוֹדָ֖ם <sup>3519 </sup> <n>and in their glory</n> תִּתְיַמָּֽרוּ׃ <sup>3235 </sup> <n>shall ye boast</n>
7: תַּ֤חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Instead</n> בָּשְׁתְּכֶם֙ <sup>1322 </sup> <n>For your shame</n> מִשְׁנֶ֔ה <sup>4932 </sup> <n>[ye shall have] double</n> וּכְלִמָּ֖ה <sup>3639 </sup> <n>and [for] confusion</n> יָרֹ֣נּוּ <sup>7442 </sup> <n>they shall rejoice</n> חֶלְקָ֑ם <sup>2506 </sup> <n>in their portion</n> לָכֵ֤ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> בְּאַרְצָם֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>therefore in their land</n> מִשְׁנֶ֣ה <sup>4932 </sup> <n>the double</n> יִירָ֔שׁוּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>they shall possess</n> שִׂמְחַ֥ת <sup>8057 </sup> <n>joy</n> עוֹלָ֖ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>everlasting</n> תִּהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָהֶֽם׃
8: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֲנִ֤י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>For I the LORD</n> אֹהֵ֣ב <sup>157 </sup> <n>love</n> מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>judgment</n> שֹׂנֵ֥א <sup>8130 </sup> <n>I hate</n> גָזֵ֖ל <sup>1498 </sup> <n>robbery</n> בְּעוֹלָ֑ה <sup>5930 </sup> <n>for burnt offering</n> וְנָתַתִּ֤י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and I will direct</n> פְעֻלָּתָם֙ <sup>6468 </sup> <n>their work</n> בֶּאֱמֶ֔ת <sup>571 </sup> <n>in truth</n> וּבְרִ֥ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>covenant</n> עוֹלָ֖ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>an everlasting</n> אֶכְר֥וֹת <sup>3772 </sup> <n>and I will make</n> לָהֶֽם׃
9: וְנוֹדַ֤ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>shall be known</n> בַּגּוֹיִם֙ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among the Gentiles</n> זַרְעָ֔ם <sup>2233 </sup> <n>And their seed</n> וְצֶאֱצָאֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>6631 </sup> <n>and their offspring</n> בְּת֣וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>among</n> הָעַמִּ֑ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> רֹֽאֵיהֶם֙ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>all that see</n> יַכִּיר֔וּם <sup>5234 </sup> <n>them shall acknowledge</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> הֵ֥ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>they</n> זֶ֖רַע <sup>2233 </sup> <n>them that they [are] the seed</n> בֵּרַ֥ךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>hath blessed</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[which] the LORD</n> ס
10: שׂ֧וֹשׂ <sup>7797 </sup> <n>I will greatly</n> אָשִׂ֣ישׂ <sup>7797 </sup> <n>rejoice</n> בַּֽיהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>in the LORD</n> תָּגֵ֤ל <sup>1523 </sup> <n>shall be joyful</n> נַפְשִׁי֙ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>my soul</n> בֵּֽאלֹהַ֔י <sup>430 </sup> <n>in my God</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הִלְבִּישַׁ֙נִי֙ <sup>3847 </sup> <n>for he hath clothed</n> בִּגְדֵי־ <sup>899 </sup> <n>me with the garments</n> יֶ֔שַׁע <sup>3468 </sup> <n>of salvation</n> מְעִ֥יל <sup>4598 </sup> <n>me with the robe</n> צְדָקָ֖ה <sup>6666 </sup> <n>of righteousness</n> יְעָטָ֑נִי <sup>3271 </sup> <n>he hath covered</n> כֶּֽחָתָן֙ <sup>2860 </sup> <n>as a bridegroom</n> יְכַהֵ֣ן <sup>3547 </sup> <n>decketh</n> פְּאֵ֔ר <sup>6287 </sup> <n>[himself] with ornaments</n> וְכַכַּלָּ֖ה <sup>3618 </sup> <n>and as a bride</n> תַּעְדֶּ֥ה <sup>5710 </sup> <n>adorneth</n> כֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>3627 </sup> <n>[herself] with her jewels</n>
11: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> כָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>For as the earth</n> תּוֹצִ֣יא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>bringeth forth</n> צִמְחָ֔הּ <sup>6780 </sup> <n>her bud</n> וּכְגַנָּ֖ה <sup>1593 </sup> <n>and as the garden</n> זֵרוּעֶ֣יהָ <sup>2221 </sup> <n>causeth the things that are sown</n> תַצְמִ֑יחַ <sup>6779 </sup> <n>in it to spring forth</n> כֵּ֣ן ׀ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>So</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>so the Lord</n> יְהוִ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>GOD</n> יַצְמִ֤יחַ <sup>6779 </sup> <n>to spring forth</n> צְדָקָה֙ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>will cause righteousness</n> וּתְהִלָּ֔ה <sup>8416 </sup> <n>and praise</n> נֶ֖גֶד <sup>5048 </sup> <n>before</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>before all the nations</n>
